pages.text: $(li)The Voline is a hostile creature that can be found in $(l:patchouli:biomes/nether/nether_wastes)Nether Wastes$(/l) of the Nether.$(br)$(li)Holding a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/magma_cream)Magma Cream$(/l) in your hand in front of it will make it stop from attacking you temporarily.$(br)$(li)This creature may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gold_nugget)Golden Nuggets$(/l) upon death.
$(li)If you drop a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/magma_cream)Magma Cream$(/l) on the ground near a Voline, it will start to eat it.
$(li)For every one that it eats, it will become more and more slow and fat.
$(li)When it eats a good quantity of them, it will emit smoke.

$(li)Now you can drop Golden items to the ground that it will eat them too. Later, it will drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gold_nugget)Golden Nuggets$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/infernalexp/molten_gold_cluster)Molten Gold Clusters$(/l).
